title: Sabbir and gifts
text:
Sabbir is a little boy. he went to a gift shop with his mother. There werendifferent types of gifts in the shop. All the gifts were attractive to Sabbir. He wanted to buy all the gifts which are in price range a ≤ p ≤ b. You are given prices of all the gifts anda,b. Sabbir's mother need your help. Please calculate the total amount of price of all gifts of that range for Sabbir's mother.InputIn the first line there will ben, the number of gifts in the shop.In the next line there will benintegersp1,p2,p3...pndenoting price of every gift.In the third line there will beQ, the number of queries.The nextQlines contain two integersaandb.Constraints1 ≤ n ≤ 105.1 ≤ pi≤ 109.1 ≤ Q ≤ 105.1 ≤ a, b ≤ 109.OutputPrintQlines. Every line contains one integer, sum of all prices for that range given in the query.ExampleInput:7
1 3 2 1 5 2 2
4
1 2
1 5
3 5
4 5Output:8
16
8
5NOTE: for first query, Sabbir will buy all the gifts of prices 1, 2, 1, 2, 2. So, sum is 8.For second query, Sabbir will buy all the gifts, so the sum is 16.
